about_the_game:
TurtleQuest is a 2D-Platformer where you are sent on a quest to save your little turtle village from an unknown disease.
You have to follow an ancient path through the old mountains to find the sacred plant Zingiber, which might help to cure all turtles.

You Play As Seni



As you follow the path, you hike through various kinds of levels with hidden traps, natural obstacles, and bewitched things.

TurtleQuest is inspired by games like "TrapAdventure", "Cat Mario", "I Wanna Be The Guy", so it is quite difficult but in a cute look.

As of now does TurtleQuest only have 7 levels, I am going on summer vacation, and if enough people are interested in the game, will try and make many more.
So please tell your friends about this game, if you liked it, or if you want to see how they manage to beat each level.
